original_text: I know that you want to help very much. I have told the believers in Macedonia how good you are. I tell them that you believers in Achaia have been ready to give your money since last year. Because you are so ready to help, most of them now also want to help. Corinthians 8 Corinthians 10
korean_text: 이는 내가 너희의 원함을 앎이라 내가 너희를 위하여 마게도냐인들에게 아가야에서는 일 년 전부터 준비하였다는 것을 자랑하였는데 과연 너희의 열심이 퍽 많은 사람들을 분발하게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: I know that you want to help very much.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 매우 돕고 싶어한다는 것을 안다.

sentences.original_text: I have told the believers in Macedonia
I tell them that you believers in Achaia
have been ready to give your money
Because you are so ready to help,
most of them now also want to help.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 대부분도 이제 돕기를 원한다.
